message.name: RADIO_STATUS_V2
message.description: Status generated by radio and injected into MAVLink stream.
message.field: Local Rssi in dBm, INT16_MAX: invalid/unknown.
Local signal strength indication in device-dependent units/scale. Values: [0-254], UINT8_MAX: invalid/unknown.
Local link quality (LQ) in percent. Values: [0-100], UINT8_MAX: invalid/unknown.
Local SNR in dBm, INT16_MAX: invalid/unknown.
Remote Rssi in dBm, INT16_MAX: invalid/unknown.
Remote signal strength indication in device-dependent units/scale. Values: [0-254], UINT8_MAX: invalid/unknown.
Remote link quality (LQ) in percent. Values: [0-100], UINT8_MAX: invalid/unknown.
Remote SNR in dBm, INT16_MAX: invalid/unknown.
